titleStmt.title: The first volume of letters writ by a Turkish spy who lived five and forty years undiscovered at Paris : giving an impartial account to the Divan at Constantinople of the most remarkable transactions of Europe : and discovering several intrigues and secrets of the Christian courts (especially of that of France) from the year 1637 to the year 1682 / written originally in Arabick, first translated into Italian, afterwards into French and now into English.
titleStmt.author: Marana, Giovanni Paolo, 1642-1693.
Saltmarsh, Daniel.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
